name: D&D Lords of Waterdeep: Skullport expansion
summary: Now available: The award-winning Dungeons & Dragons expansion for Lords of Waterdeep – Scoundrels of Skullport! Skullport -- also known as the Port of Shadows – is nestled in the heart of Undermountain. A haven for nefarious crimes, underhanded deals and back-alley murders, Skullport is a hive of evil beneath the City of Splendors.
